sentences.sContent: It pleased me to domineer over her, and she generally submitted to my tyranny rather than risk a hand-to-hand encounter.
sentences.sContent_eng: It pleased me to domineer over her, and she generally submitted to my tyranny rather than risk a hand-to-hand encounter.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢对她作威作福，而她通常宁可屈从我的专横，不愿冒著和我直接冲突的危险。

remMethod.val: domin (支配) + eer (人) → 支配某人 → 作威作福

words.tran: 跋扈的；专横的；盛气凌人的
实行暴政；高耸；流行（domineer的ing形式）
